comments.author: M. @ V. Gourmet
comments.content: Mmm, this looks SO good - the fava beans are a great twist. Do you use normal crimini mushrooms? baby bellas? whatever's in stock? I wonder if something like fresh chanterelles or shiitakes would shine or just get lost in the rice (if you could afford/find them)?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Thanks! I did this with criminis, but you can absolutely experiment with other options. I'm pretty sure morels, shiitakes or porcini would be amazing; chanterelles might be great or maybe their more delicate flavor would be lost in this treatment.
